function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex modeling of disease dynamics","Impact":"Difficulty in accurately representing disease spread","Mitigation":"Use of simpler models for specific scenarios, validation with real-world data","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, machine learning, data validation tools","People":"Disease modelers, public health officials","Owner":"Disease modeling teams, research institutions"},{"Description":"Unclear vaccine coverage and transmission rate","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of disease spread and vaccine effectiveness","Mitigation":"Accurate data collection, transparency in reporting vaccine coverage and transmission rates","Technologies":"Data collection tools, statistical analysis software","People":"Public health authorities, epidemiologists","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Model measurement errors","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of disease dynamics and reproductive ratio","Mitigation":"Quality control procedures, error correction methods, sensitivity analysis","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, error correction algorithms","People":"Data analysts, disease modelers","Owner":"Research institutions, academic institutions"}]}
